entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Most dotnet commands fail with WorkloadManifestCompositionException after installing VSPreview #24854
  • Improve performance of workload installation #24843
  • `dotnet run` shouldn't report usage when the build itself fails #24842
    7.0.1xx
  • .NET 6.0 upgrade gives System.TypeLoadException Could not load type 'System.IO.File' from assembly System.Runtime Version=6.0.0.0 #24835

Closed

  • Support additional target frameworks such as for Xamarin, UWP, etc #491
    Backlog
  • Port dotnet/sdk SourceBuild patches from dotnet/installer #22281
    6.0.3xx
  • Port PackageValidation flaky build failure fixes to 6.0 #22353
    6.0.3xx
  • [Failing test] GivenThatWeWantToPublishIncrementally.It_cleans_for_mvc_projects #16456
    6.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24853
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #24852
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #23881
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net6.0 to the current framework #24836
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24850
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Stabilize branding for the SDK 6.0.300 #24831
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24830
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24823
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Turn test back on. #24661
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
  • Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24760
  • Pin the compiler version in RSG to an exact version #24598
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.2xx
  • bump WarningLevel to 7 for .NET 7 #24826
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Replace rollForward in tools runtimeconfig #24817
    Area-Infrastructure
